person.persName: Simon C. Oliver (Lyon County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Josiah Oliver and Elizabeth Oliver. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Lyon County in 1863. Served in the 3rd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from December 15, 1864, to May 2, 1865. Reported as deserted on April 18, 1865. Signed an oath of allegiance to the United States Government on May 2, 1865.
